sentence: The teams traded fumbles on successive plays to begin the fourth quarter, with Brady losing the ball after being hit again by Miller and Rams center Brian Allen fumbling the snap.
title: Kansas City is in the hunt after a rough start to the season.

sentence: Coach Kevin O'Connell's former team, the Rams, locked up two offensive linemen with three-year extensions for center Brian Allen and tackle Joseph Noteboom.
author: Andrew Krammer
title: Vikings agree to deal with ex-Bills defensive tackle Harrison Phillips, release Michael Pierce

sentence: Since Monday, when teams could start negotiating with other teams’ free agents, the Rams have not announced any acquisitions, while they’ve re-signed tackle Joe Noteboom – groomed as retiring left tackle Andrew Whitworth’s successor – and center Brian Allen and guard-center Coleman Shelton.
author: Kevin Modesti
title: Rams lose Von Miller after Bills come with cash
